about_the_game:
The package includes 10 unique quest battles for captains from 10 to 25 levels.
In addition to the final prize, a reward in credits is awarded for each damage to the enemy ship's hull. For damaging another Lord's ship, the reward is much higher than for damaging an alien ship. A reward for each destroyed minibot will be awarded, even if your ship is destroyed.
8 vs 8 teams.
Entrance for captains level 10-25.
Hint: Resurrection works - stock up on minibots.


As a reward, you will also receive Penetrating Drones, which shoot a Penetrating Laser. In the game, such drones are extremely rare and are sold only for tritium.


How to use the DLC:
  • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game.
  • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor Window as a quest with 10 battles. Each subsequent battle appears after the end of the previous one, regardless of the battle results: victory or defeat. The battle will be visible in the arena and other players will be able to join it. You can invite up to 5 allies from the start.
  • Enjoy your DLC!

Attention, important!

In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.
detailed_description:
A CINEMATIC SPACE SHOOTER - WISHLIST NOW!



About the Game

The package includes 10 unique quest battles for captains from 10 to 25 levels.
In addition to the final prize, a reward in credits is awarded for each damage to the enemy ship's hull. For damaging another Lord's ship, the reward is much higher than for damaging an alien ship. A reward for each destroyed minibot will be awarded, even if your ship is destroyed.
8 vs 8 teams.
Entrance for captains level 10-25.
Hint: Resurrection works - stock up on minibots.


As a reward, you will also receive Penetrating Drones, which shoot a Penetrating Laser. In the game, such drones are extremely rare and are sold only for tritium.


How to use the DLC:
  • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game.
  • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor Window as a quest with 10 battles. Each subsequent battle appears after the end of the previous one, regardless of the battle results: victory or defeat. The battle will be visible in the arena and other players will be able to join it. You can invite up to 5 allies from the start.
  • Enjoy your DLC!

Attention, important!

In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1950 256Mb and higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: X 10.6.8
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
